Examples

Collaboration diagram for Examples:

Detailed Description

Examples of using the library.

Here is an example of building ex1_intro assuming that FCLib, Exodus are all installed in /usr/local:

gcc -o ex1_intro ex1_intro.c -I/usr/local/bin/include \
            -L/usr/local/bin/lib -lfc  -lvbt -ldsl -lz -lm
